definition: Matsu Islands off Fujian, administered by Taiwan

Matsu Islands

sentences.english: From the coast of Mazu, you can actually see the villager walking on the opposite side.
sentences.chinese: 从马祖的海岸，你其实看得见对面行走的乡亲。

sentences.english: You can appreciate the same scenery in Matsu.
sentences.chinese: 在马祖你也可以欣赏到同样的风景。

sentences.english: That our government recognizes Quemoy and Matsu to be a part of Mainland China.
sentences.chinese: 我国政府承认金门岛和马祖岛是中国大陆的一部分。
